column5: Hi all,  just wondering how to remove a top guide on a rod….the ceramic has popped out on both my uglysticks and i wanna replace with new ones.
heat it up (with a lighter) grab it with vice grips and work it off
Lend the rod to a friend.
heat it up (with a lighter) grab it with vice grips and work it off Thanks RAF.  Lend the rod to a friend.  lol…good one Rob.
heat it up (with a lighter) grab it with vice grips and work it off  This.. just be careful not to overheat. Doesn't take a lot of heat to loosen the epoxy enough.
